name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Sailpoint Engineer with 9+ years of experience in Identity Access Management (IAM) and connector development. Proficient in **Sailpoint**, **SAP**, **GRC**, and **Ariba**, with a strong background in access provisioning and JML lifecycle management. Highly skilled in policy management and leveraging OOTB connectors for streamlined operations. Additionally, I possess strong analytical and troubleshooting skills, complemented by excellent communication abilities. My technical expertise includes a robust understanding of software development processes, with hands-on experience in architecting microservices and distributed systems using technologies such as **.NET**, **C#**, **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, and cloud services. Recognized for delivering high-quality solutions and effectively leading cross-functional teams to successful project completion.

experience.responsibilities:
Led the development of identity access management solutions leveraging **Sailpoint** to enhance security and streamline **IAM** processes across platforms.
Designed and implemented **JML lifecycle** management strategies to optimize **access provisioning**, improving onboarding and offboarding efficiency by 30%.
Developed and customized **OOTB connectors** to integrate with **SAP** and **Ariba**, improving data synchronization and compliance tracking.
Conducted thorough policy management audits within **GRC** frameworks, enhancing governance and risk management processes.
Utilized analytical skills to troubleshoot issues related to connector development, reducing resolution times by 50%.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, employing strong communication skills to align project goals and objectives.
Created detailed documentation and training materials to facilitate the onboarding of new team members in **Sailpoint** best practices.
Engaged stakeholders through regular updates and feedback sessions, fostering transparency and project alignment.
Implemented strategies to enhance user experience and system performance, leading to increased stakeholder satisfaction by 20%.

Utilized **Sailpoint** for effective **IAM** solutions, improving access provisioning processes by up to **20%**.
Developed and managed **GRC** policies to ensure compliance with **SAP** and **Ariba** integrations, enhancing security measures.
Led the transformation of the **JML lifecycle**, implementing automation strategies that decreased manual processes by **30%**.
Conducted connector development for multiple systems, maximizing the use of **OOTB connectors** for increased deployment efficiency.
Applied analytical skills to troubleshoot and resolve access issues, boosting resolution speed by **25%**.
Implemented best practices in policy management, fostering a robust framework for ongoing compliance and risk management.
Facilitated communication with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, ensuring alignment with project timelines.
Provided documentation and training on best practices for new members, enhancing team capabilities in **Sailpoint** functionality.
Conducted regular audits of IAM processes to identify areas for improvement, leading to optimized access controls and reduced security risks.

Implemented and managed **Sailpoint** for access provisioning across various systems, enhancing IAM processes.
Developed connectors for **SAP** and **Ariba**, streamlining the JML lifecycle and improving policy management through effective integration.
Designed and executed 5 OOTB connectors, significantly reducing development time for new integrations by 30%.
Utilized analytical skills to troubleshoot and resolve incidents, decreasing system downtime by **15%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure compliance with GRC objectives, enhancing overall governance effectiveness.
Conducted detailed communication with stakeholders to gather requirements, ensuring alignment with organizational goals.
Participated in the design and implementation of security policies to safeguard sensitive information, thereby increasing data integrity.
Provided training and technical documentation for team members on **Sailpoint** functionalities, promoting knowledge sharing and skill enhancement.
Maintained and improved existing connector development practices, resulting in a **20%** increase in efficiency during the integration processes.
